text: Helmut Schlesinger (4 September 1924 - 23 December 2024) was a German economist. He was the President of the Bundesbank. He was born in Penzberg, Bavaria. He was a member of the Orders of Merit and of Chivalry of Germany, Italy, Austria, Hungary, Sweden, and Luxembourg. Schlesinger turned 100 in September 2024. He died on 23 December 2024.Bundesbank nimmt Abschied von Helmut Schlesinger ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German centenarians Category:German bankers Category:German economists Category:People from Bavaria
title: Helmut Schlesinger
